casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Antoine WALTON Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 21, 2017 Bruce R. Lockwood, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

Matthew C. Eagan, assigned counsel, and Michael S. Taylor, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 175 Conn. App. 642 , 168 A.3d 652 (2017), is denied.

ROBINSON, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
